Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Configure your AI chat experience and model parameters.
Settings.temperatureHelp: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic; higher values are more creative.
Settings.contextSizeHelp: Maximum tokens in a conversation. Higher allows longer chats but uses more memory.

Config.showingModelsFrom: Showing models from: {provider} provider. Type to filter available models.

RAG.embeddingSetupDesc: Choose an embedding model for RAG. It converts text into vectors for semantic search and retrieval.

PDF.title: PDF Parser Configuration
PDF.parserServerDesc: Uses AI models for better layout-aware extraction, formulas, tables, and OCR. Requires a running server and more time.
PDF.kreuzbergDesc: Local extraction via Kreuzberg with complex layout and table support. No OCR; limited LaTeX support.

RAGPanel.emptyKb: No documents in this knowledge base

Upload.dropOrClick: Drop files here or click to browse
Upload.alreadyExists: File already exists, using existing version

Create.enterName: Please enter a knowledge base name
Create.selectOneCollection: Please select at least one collection
Create.noItems: No items found in the selected Zotero collections.
Create.descNew: Create a new empty knowledge base. You can add documents to it later.
Create.descFromCollections: Add documents from selected Zotero collections to a new knowledge base.
Create.refFilteringHelp: Filter out references and citations from document content using Naive Bayes, trained on narrow domain of data. Plan to broaden and refine its dataset.
Create.noCollectionsSelected: No collections selected. Please select collections from the sidebar.

EnvVars.title: Environment Variables
EnvVars.descAcademicMailto: Enter email to increase rate limit to academic search

EnvVars.descNCBI: NCBI/PubMed API key to increase rate limit

Section.title: Knowledge MCP Server
Section.desc: serving knowledge bases to preferred LLM clients.

Config.savedAndRestarted: MCP configuration saved and server restarted successfully

Config.title: MCP Server Configuration
Config.clientConfigDesc: Copy this configuration for use in MCP clients (Claude Desktop, VSCode, etc.)

JSON.title: MCP Configuration
JSON.failed: Failed to generate MCP configuration examples.
JSON.desc: Copy and use these configurations to connect MCP clients to the knowledge base server.
JSON.stdioDesc: Direct process communication via stdin/stdout. Recommended for desktop applications.
JSON.httpDesc: HTTP-based communication. Good for web-based clients and debugging.
JSON.sseDesc: SSE-based communication. Suitable for real-time web applications.
